    • Election

    • Method Detail

      • coinToss

        public Candidate coinToss​(java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> candidates)
        This function randomly decides the winner out of the candidates who has same amounts of votes.
        Parameters:
        candidates - A list of candidates whose have same votes
        Returns:
        A candidate chosen randomly from the list of candidates
        Precondition:
        Candidates in the given list has the same votes
        Postcondition:
        The chosen candidate is removed from the list of candidates with same votes.

      • getTotalVotes

        public int getTotalVotes()
        This function retrieves the total number of votes in the election.
        Returns:
        The number of total votes of the current election.
        Precondition:
        The file has been processed
        Postcondition:
        None

      • setTotalVotes

        public void setTotalVotes​(int totalVotes)

      • runElection

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> runElection()
        This function runs the algorithm which counts the votes and decides the winner(s).
        Returns:
        a list of Candidate objects
        Precondition:
        The file has been processed.
        Postcondition:
        The list of candidates with voting information

      • appendFinalResult

        public void appendFinalResult​(java.lang.String append)
        Appends the string to the media report file.
        Parameters:
        append - string to append to the media file
        Precondition:
        The algorithm has finished calculating the votes and decided the winner(s)
        Postcondition:
        A string used to print out information onto the screen has been appended with extra information about winner(s).

      • appendAuditFile

        public void appendAuditFile​(java.lang.String append)
        Appends the string to the audit file.
        Parameters:
        append - string to append to the audit file
        Precondition:
        The algorithm has finished calculating the votes and decided the winner(s)
        Postcondition:
        A string used for storing in the audit file has been appended with extra information that replicate the election.

                          throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException
